item.description:
Hi Patriots & Allies,

This is an URGENT plea for all of you to attend a State of NH Tea Party which will be hosted by Cornerstone and co-hosted by 24 additional groups including the Granite State Patriots.
It will be held on Wednesday, June 24th at 12:00 PM at the Statehouse Plaza in Concord.

This is the day that the State Budget will be voted on and you can expect numerous new taxes to be approved by the Dems (and some Rino's) in the NH House. Some of the proposed taxes are:

1. 49% tax on expanded gambling in the form of Video Slots.
2. Suspension of the Business Enterprise Tax Credit in 2011 penalizing companies based on the dollar amount of their payroll.
3. Increase in the Rooms & Meals Tax to 8.75% (a 10% increase).
4. confiscation of $110 million dollars from the Joint Medical Malpractice Insurance Fund.
5. Increase in the Tobacco Tax to $1.78. The fourth increase in five years.
6. Increase in the fee for drivers License's, Car Registrations, Vanity Plates and doubles the Boat Registration fee.
7. eliminates the EZ Pass discount
8. Increases the Home Heating Oil Tax by 25%.

This is a list of proposed taxes. It does not contain any of the additional taxes already approved.

Keep in mind folks, that we are in a recession! There should be no tax increases whatsoever.
Further, it really comes down to their excess SPENDING which is completely out of control.
If you want to take back your country, it must start with your State.
Please be there on June 24th and bring your signs focusing on "It's the Spending Stupid" or something like that.

Thanks for your support.


Jack Kimball
Granite State Patriots
item.name: State Of NH Tea Party
